Message.MsgText: XBGA0790E=XBGA0790E: Error encountered when attempting to redeploy WebSphere endpoint {0} to use datasource {1}. Exception = {1}.
Message.Explanation: The WebSphere endpoint redeployment operation has reported error(s).
Message.UserResponse: Ensure that the server or cluster hosting the endpoint has stopped.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0780E=XBGA0780E: An attempt has been made to redeploy the WebSphere endpoint cluster {1} using the embedded Derby datasource {0}.
Message.Explanation: A network datasource is required for a WebSphere endpoint cluster.
Message.UserResponse: Create and select a datasource for a network database.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0450E=XBGA0450E: The long-running scheduler has not been configured yet.
Message.Explanation: No long-running scheduler attributes or properties have been set.
Message.UserResponse: Configure long-running scheduler by using modifyLongRunningSchedulerAttribute to set attribute or createLongRunningSchedulerProperty to create custom property.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0770E=XBGA0770E: Error encountered when attempting to redeploy WebSphere endpoint {0} to use datasource {1}. Exception = {1}.
Message.Explanation: This is an internal configuration problem.
Message.UserResponse: Contact IBM Support.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0760I=XBGA0760I: The WebSphere endpoint {0} has successfully been redeployed using the datasource {1}.
Message.Explanation: The WebSphere endpoint has been re-configured to use the selected datasource.
Message.UserResponse: Recycle redeployed endpoint.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0750E=XBGA0750E: Error encountered when attempting to remove the job scheduler from {0}. Exception = {1}.
Message.Explanation: This is an internal configuration problem.
Message.UserResponse: Contact IBM Support.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0740I=XBGA0740I: The job scheduler has successfully been removed from {0}.
Message.Explanation: The job scheduler has been uninstalled and taken out of service.
Message.UserResponse: Recycle all job scheduler servers to complete the uninstall operation.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0730E=XBGA0730E: An attempt has been made to deploy the job scheduler to {1} without the specification of a datasource.
Message.Explanation: A datasource selection is required to deploy the job scheduler.
Message.UserResponse: Create and select a valid datasource.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0720E=XBGA0720E: An attempt has been made to deploy the job scheduler to the cluster {1} using the embedded Derby datasource {0}.
Message.Explanation: A network datasource is required to deploy the job scheduler to a cluster.
Message.UserResponse: Create and select a datasource for a network database.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0710E=XBGA0710E: Error encountered when attempting to deploy the job scheduler to {0} using the datasource {1}. Exception = {2}
Message.Explanation: This is an internal configuration problem.
Message.UserResponse: Contact IBM Support.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0700I=XBGA0700I: The job scheduler has successfully been deployed to {0} using the datasource {1}.
Message.Explanation: The job scheduler has been configured to run on the specified deployment target using the datasource selected.
Message.UserResponse: Recycle job scheduler deployment target.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0810E=XBGA0810E: Error encountered when attempting to redeploy the WebSphere endpoint {0}.
Message.Explanation: Errors have been detected during the redeployment of the WebSphere endpoint.
Message.UserResponse: View JVM logs or trace.log for further details.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0800E=XBGA0800E: Error encountered when attempting to configure the job scheduler.
Message.Explanation: Errors have been detected during the configuration of the job scheduler.
Message.UserResponse: View JVM logs or trace.log for further details.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0454E=XBGA0454E: Encountered error in getting {0} value. Exception = {1}
Message.Explanation: Unable to retrieve the value due to some errors.
Message.UserResponse: Check to see if the long-running scheduler has been configured.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0764I=XBGA0764I: The deployment manager is invoking the job scheduler.
Message.Explanation: The deployment manager is calling the configuration of the job scheduler.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0453E=XBGA0453E: Custom property {0} already exists for long-running scheduler.
Message.Explanation: A long-running scheduler property with the specified name is already created.
Message.UserResponse: Choose another name for the long-running scheduler property, and try the operation again.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0763I=XBGA0763I: The job scheduler is being deployed to {0}.
Message.Explanation: The job scheduler is being configured to run on the specified deployment target.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0452E=XBGA0452E: The property name {0} is not a valid long-running scheduler custom property.
Message.Explanation: The property name specified is not a valid long-running scheduler property.
Message.UserResponse: Try the operation again by selecting a valid property. Use listLongRunningSchedulerProperties to list all available properties.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0762I=XBGA0762I: An administrative agent is invoking the job scheduler configuration.
Message.Explanation: An administrative agent is calling the configuration of the job scheduler.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0451E=XBGA0451E: The attribute name {0} is not a valid long-running scheduler attribute.
Message.Explanation: The attribute name specified is not a valid long-running scheduler attribute.
Message.UserResponse: Try the operation again by selecting a valid attribute to create or modify. Valid attributes are datasourceJNDIName and datasourceAlias.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0761I=XBGA0761I: The {0} stand-alone process is invoking the job scheduler configuration,
Message.Explanation: The specified process is calling the configuration of the job scheduler.
Message.UserResponse: No user action is required.

Message.MsgText: XBGA0751E=XBGA0751E: Error encountered when attempting to remove the job scheduler from {0}. Exception = {1}.
Message.Explanation: The job scheduler uninstall operation has reported error(s).
Message.UserResponse: Ensure that the server or cluster hosting the job scheduler has stopped.
